QueryViewSpec.Name: Child Interactions Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Query to allow searching for various Child Interactions used for Global Changes.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCHILDLOOKUPID (soc.ID, 1) as CHILDLOOKUPID , dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION.LOOKUPID as LOCATIONLOOKUPID , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CURRENTPROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE , (select dbo.USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CHILDLIVESWITHCODEID) as CHILDLIVESWITHDESCRIPTION , (select dbo.USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.FATHERWORKSASCODEID) as FATHERWORKSASDESCRIPTION , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.FATHERWORKSASOTHER , (select dbo.USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.MOTHERWORKSASCODEID) as MOTHERWORKSASDESCRIPTION , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.MOTHERWORKSASOTHER , (select dbo.USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CAREGIVERRELATIONCODEID) as CAREGIVERRELATIONDESCRIPTION , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CAREGIVERRELATIONOTHER , (select dbo.USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CAREGIVERWORKSASCODEID) as CAREGIVERWORKSASDESCRIPTION , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CAREGIVERWORKSASOTHER , (select dbo.USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CAREGIVERREASONCODEID) as CAREGIVERREASONDESCRIPTION , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.REASONFORCAREGIVEROTHER , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.NUMBEROFSISTERS , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.NUMBEROFBROTHERS , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.TERMINATEHOLDSTARTDATE -- , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CCHZIPFILENAME , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.DEPARTUREFORMRECEIVED -- , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CHILDNICKNAME , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CCHVALIDATED -- , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.DATECHANGED -- , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.DATEADDED , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.REGISTRATIONDATE , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.BATCHNUMBER , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.FUNDED , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.PROFILEUPDATENOTIFICATION , (select dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODEID) as CHILDPROFILEUPDATEDESCRIPTION , (select dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODEID) as CHILDPROFILESTATUSDESCRIPTION , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.PHOTOSTORED , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CURRENTPHOTODATE , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CCHTEMPID , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CCHENTEREDBY , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.ADDITIONALCHILDINFORMATION , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CLASSLEVEL , dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.ATTENDINGSCHOOL , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.NODEPARTUREFORM -- , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.RECEIVEDFAREWELLLETTERCODE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.RECEIVEDFAREWELLLETTER , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DATEFORMCOMPLETED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.FORMCOMPLETEDBY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DATEOFDEPARTURE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DATEPROCESSED , (select dbo.USR_DEPARTURE_ADMINISTRATIVE_CODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_DEPARTURE_ADMINISTRATIVE_CODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ADMINISTRATIVECODEID) as ADMINISTRATIVECODE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ADMINISTRATIVEEXPLANATION , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISDEPARTURE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISPROGRAMCOMPLETION , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_LIVESWITHRELATIVES , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_FAMILYMOVED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_FAMILYNOWPROVIDES , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_PROJECTTOOFAR , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_REMOVEDBYPARENTS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_LACKOFINTEREST , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_NEEDEDATHOME , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_EMPLOYED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_TRANSFERRED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_FAILED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_DEATHOFCHILD , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_ILLNESS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_PREGNANCY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_MARRIED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURE_OTHER , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DETAILEDEXPLANATION , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURENEWSITUATION , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.PROGRAMCOMPLETIONNEWSITUATION -- , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISCHILDCHRISTIANCODE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISCHILDCHRISTIAN , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.CHILDCHRISTIANCOMMENTS -- , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DIDBECOMECHRISTIANCODE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DIDBECOMECHRISTIAN , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SHOWSCHRISTIANKNOWLEDGE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.PARTICIPATESCHRISTIANACTIVITIES , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SHOWSCHRISTIANEVIDENCE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.OWNSBIBLEMATERIALS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.CHILDCHRISTIANEXPERIENCE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.HEALTHCONDITIONS -- , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.CHILDMATUREDCODE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.CHILDMATURED , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.LEVELOFMATURITY , (select dbo.USR_CHILDCLASSLEVEL_CODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_CHILDCLASSLEVEL_CODE where ID = dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.HIGHESTCLASSLEVELCODEID) as HIGHESTCLASSLEVELCODE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.HIGHESTCLASSLEVELOTHER , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.COURSEOFSTUDY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_BASICLITERACY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_BASICNUMERACY , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_THINKINGPROBLEMSOLVING , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_SELFHELP , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_BUSINESS , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_LIFE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_VOCATIONALTECHNICAL , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SKILLS_OTHER , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.GENERALCOMMENTS -- , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURETYPECODE , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.DEPARTURETYPE -- , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.CHILDREGISTRATIONDATE -- , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISCURRENTDEPARTURECODE -- , dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISCURRENTDEPARTURE , dbo.INTERACTION.ID -- , dbo.INTERACTION.CONSTITUENTID -- , dbo.INTERACTION.PROSPECTPLANID -- , dbo.INTERACTION.FUNDRAISERID -- , dbo.INTERACTION.PLANOUTLINESTEPID , dbo.INTERACTION.OBJECTIVE , (select [DESCRIPTION] from dbo.INTERACTIONTYPECODE where ID = dbo.INTERACTION.INTERACTIONTYPECODEID) as INTERACTIONTYPEDESCRIPTION , dbo.INTERACTION.EXPECTEDDATE , dbo.INTERACTION.ACTUALDATE , dbo.INTERACTION.[DATE] as INTERACTIONDATE -- , dbo.INTERACTION.PROSPECTPLANSTATUSCODEID -- , dbo.INTERACTION.STATUSCODE , dbo.INTERACTION.COMMENT -- , dbo.INTERACTION.ISINTERACTION -- , dbo.INTERACTION.EVENTID , (select [NAME] from dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY where ID = dbo.INTERACTION.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID) as INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYDESCRIPTION , dbo.INTERACTION.STATUS -- , dbo.INTERACTION.COMPLETED -- , dbo.INTERACTION.FUNDINGREQUESTID -- , dbo.INTERACTION.FUNDINGREQUESTSTAGECODEID -- , dbo.INTERACTION.FUNDINGREQUESTOUTLINESTEPID -- , dbo.INTERACTION.CUSTOMIDENTIFIER , dbo.INTERACTION.SEQUENCEID , dbo.INTERACTION.LOOKUPID -- , dbo.INTERACTION.ISCONTACTREPORT -- , dbo.INTERACTION.EXPECTEDSTARTTIME -- , dbo.INTERACTION.EXPECTEDENDTIME -- , dbo.INTERACTION.ISALLDAYEVENT -- , dbo.INTERACTION.ACTUALSTARTTIME -- , dbo.INTERACTION.ACTUALENDTIME -- , dbo.INTERACTION.STARTTIME -- , dbo.INTERACTION.ENDTIME -- , dbo.INTERACTION.EXPECTEDSTARTDATETIME -- , dbo.INTERACTION.EXPECTEDENDDATETIME -- , dbo.INTERACTION.ACTUALSTARTDATETIME -- , dbo.INTERACTION.ACTUALENDDATETIME , SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID as OPPORTUNITYID from dbo.INTERACTION left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc on dbo.INTERACTION.CONSTITUENTID = soc.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY ON dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID = soc.ID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION ON dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION.ID = dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID left join dbo.CONSTITUENT ON dbo.CONSTITUENT.ID = dbo.INTERACTION.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ON dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = soc.ID left join dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE ON dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = soc.ID and dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE.ISCURRENTDEPARTURECODE = 1 where soc.ID is not null
